AzureBlade tried to avoid some of the shots, but three hit on his 
right leg. He was really getting in the mood of battle. He was getting 
tired of this bug that kept firing at maximals. He produced a blade of 
sheer plasma from his plasma cannon and divid directly at perceptor, 
trying to pin the decepticon down.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Perceptor::
> 
> 
> Perceptor dodged the attacks and fired 10 times against Sidewipe, 10 
> against Azure blade and 5 against Maximal City
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> > AzureBlade's fast speed allowed him to dodge the missile easily. 
He
